message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I think $1,000,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $600,000. Can we discuss further?

Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While $600,000 is significantly less than I hoped for, I'm willing to move closer to your offer. Would you consider $850,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
I understand that you're willing to move closer to my offer, but $850,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
